body:
We've sent you an email with instructions to save your form. This can take a few minutes to arrive.

To save your form, you need to follow the instructions within 30 minutes of receiving the email.

### If you don't get an email

* Check your junk or spam mail
* Make sure you have entered the correct email
* [Resend the email](/returning_user_resend_email)
heading: Check your inbox
